cs301.group8.meta
Class Util

java.lang.Object
  cs301.group8.meta.Util

public class Util
extends java.lang.Object

Util is a class that provides various utility methods used throughout the app for bitmap generation, array population, and other purposes.

Version:
2.0
Author:
Group 08

getSelection

public static int getSelection(long reminder)
getSelection is used when the edit dialog is called. It is used to help set the default selection of the spinner pulldown menu.

Parameters:
reminder - long value of the reminder time in milliseconds
Returns:
return an integer number representing the position of the spinner

getFreqFloat

public static float getFreqFloat(long reminder)
getFreqFloat is used when the edit dialog is called. It is used to help populate the edittext views with the current data regarding the group.

Parameters:
reminder - long value of the reminder time in milliseconds
Returns:
result float value to fill the edit text view

parseReminder

public static long parseReminder(int position,
                                 float value)
parseReminder uses the input from the ADD_GROUP dialog to parse the value of the reminder time (in milliseconds) so that it can be stored in the database

Parameters:
position - Integer value of the reminder category spinner
value - Float value of the reminder time
Returns:
result Reminder time in milliseconds

checkReminder

public static boolean checkReminder(long reminderTime,
                                    long mostRecentTime)
checkReminder takes in a long value of the reminder time of the group and the time of the most recent picture in the group. checkReminder returns true if most recent picture time + reminder time < current time (i.e. a new picture should be taken) otherwise, checkReminder returns false

Parameters:
reminderTime - long value of reminder time in milliseconds
mostRecentTime - long value of most recent time of picture taken
Returns:
boolean

zip

public static void zip(java.lang.String[] files,
                       java.lang.String zipFile)
zip method takes in a string array of the paths to the files and a string value of the path to the zipfile. zip creates a zip archive by compressing the desired files and archiving them at the zipFile locations

Parameters:
files - String array of the file paths to be archived
zipFile - String value of the zip file path
